title: new hack found!
body: sion being able 2 turn 100 degree angles instantly. WTF. this is completely crap. i was vs sion top and when he ulted, he missed me and then turned from behind and hit me. he ran through the lane i was standing next 2 river, he ran at turret TURNED and ran back at me. this is absolutely ridiculous. my team didnt believe me until they saw it for themselves. sion went down mid lane and managed to make a right hand turn in his ult and hit 3 people on my team. i am so fed up wqith this kind of nonsense. if u dont believe me, look at my match replay and go to when sion reaches 6. this is absolutely disgraceful!

replies.body:
>sion being able 2 turn 100 degree angles instantly.

Out of context that sentences states something that's already entirely possible within the game's rules.

But yes, there are ways to exploit his pathing while ulting via the use of particular items and commands. I won't disclose.

This is ultimately a bug, and it belongs on the [bug report board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
